name: leper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is strongly disliked and avoided by other people because of something bad that he or she has done: She claimed that the rumours had made her a social leper.
old-fashioned offensive a word for a person who has leprosy (= a disease that damages a person's nerves and skin), which was used by doctors in the past but is now offensive
